item.description:
Join us to celebrate the launch of our Fall 2009 issue of Charles River Journal!

We will be at at Beacon Street Tavern, 1032 Beacon Street, in Brookline on Tuesday, September 29th to celebrate the launch of the issue. Stop by Beacon Street Tavern's private Nite Cap Lounge from 7 p.m. onwards. Please do bring friends; other contributors, editors, and local literati should be on hand. We will, of course, have copies of the issue available, as well as good company and drinks and food at reasonable prices.

If you can't wait to see the journal on the 29th, you can take a peek at the website, www.bostonpoetry.com/crj, which features a few pieces from the issue.
item.name: Charles River Journal Launch
